::Magmatron::

    "Excellent point," Magmatron said. "Could you please see=
 me in my private office?"
    Magmatron waved his hand and a door to the c=
orridor opened.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Rudra656@... 
 =
 To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, January 27, 2001 5:49 PM
  S=
ubject: Re: Training


  ::Cygnar::
      "Excuse me sir.  I was thinking a=
bout the plan and since we'll be 
  sneaking in from the back all they have=
 to do is send some of their troops 
  out the front and around.  If they d=
o that we end up trapped between two 
  groups of enemies as strong as we a=
re.  I don't think the plan will work 
  without significant losses.  Don't=
 misunderstand me I'm not questioning 
  anyone's willingness to lay down t=
heir life for this cause, but the more bots 
  you lose the fewer there are=
 to fight the next battle."

        Yahoo! Groups Sponsor 
       
       =
